amendment.description: Amendment requires the Department of Veterans Affairs to report to Congress on the establishment and operation of their mental illness research, education and clinical centers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the Secretary of the VA to submit a report to the Congress on the program of the Department of VA for the establishment and operation at Department medical centers of Medical Illness Research, Education and Clinical Centers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
